thread.title: 10th Circuit rejects wine collector's claims against Chase, Amex

author: Reuters Editorial
title: 10th Circuit rejects wine collector's claims against Chase, Amex
text:
Chase Bank and American Express Centurion Bank do not have to refund nearly $1 million to Malik Hasan, a Denver wine collector who paid that amount to the credit card issuers for wine from a now shuttered California importer, a federal appeals court ruled on Friday.
One of thousands of customers who paid for wine they never received from Berkeleyâ€™s Premier Cru, Hasan had argued that the U.S. Fair Credit Billing Act (FCBA) required the two banks to refund his credit card payments for the undelivered wine.
